channel.title: Making an item work
channel.description: Hi, how would i make an item do something if i click it in my inven, and also delete the item after use?

item.title: Making an item work
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Projeckt Revolution:

Add A Case For The ‘Read’ Action Button

How and where would i add the case and how would i found out a teletab action button? the break option

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item work
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Add A Case For The Objects Action Button.
For Example:

If You Wanted To Make A Book When Read Give You 1000 Strength Xp, Then Delete Itself You’d Add A Case For The ‘Read’ Action Button & Then Just Add What You Want It To Do.

else if (objectId == ####) { // The Object You Want To Use if(playerLevel[#] >= ##) { // If You Want A Level Requirement To Use. if(actionTimer == 0){ actionTimer = 53; startAnimation(###); // If You Want It To Do An 'Emote' (An Animation) deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), #);// What Item To Delete And How Many Of It To Delete addSkillXP((##*playerLevel[##]), ##); // The Amount Of Xp Given When Used & The Skill Its Given To sendMessage("You Have Used The ####"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[##] <= ##) { sendMessage("You need a #### level of ## to use ####"); // if you want a level restriction on the use of the item } } }

Read full topic

You rub the strong fire into the magic stone to create a firework.
then after the } hit enter and put this

if((itemUsed == 11971 && useWith == 11972) || (itemUsed == 11971 && useWith == 11972) && q3stage == 3) { sendMessage("You put the shards together to form a blade."); deleteItem(11971, getItemSlot(11971), 1); addItem(11960, 1); }
you can change the numbers and message and your done
